parameters.name: channels
parameters.description: The Amazon Connect channels this quick response applies to. (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The content of the quick response. content (string) --- The content of the quick response.

nested_params.name: content
nested_params.description: The content of the quick response.

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The media type of the quick response content. Use application/x.quickresponse;format=plain for a quick response written in plain text. Use application/x.quickresponse;format=markdown for a quick response written in richtext.

parameters.name: groupingConfiguration
parameters.description: The configuration information of the user groups that the quick response is accessible to. criteria (string) --- The criteria used for grouping Wisdom users. The following is the list of supported criteria values. RoutingProfileArn: Grouping the users by their Amazon Connect routing profile ARN. User should have SearchRoutingProfile and DescribeRoutingProfile permissions when setting criteria to this value. values (list) --- The list of values that define different groups of Wisdom users. When setting criteria to RoutingProfileArn, you need to provide a list of ARNs of Amazon Connect routing profiles as values of this parameter. (string) ---

nested_params.name: criteria
nested_params.description: The criteria used for grouping Wisdom users. The following is the list of supported criteria values.

nested_params.name: values
nested_params.description: The list of values that define different groups of Wisdom users.

parameters.name: knowledgeBaseId
parameters.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. This should not be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base if you're storing Wisdom Content resource to it. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the quick response.

parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: criteria
nested_items.description: The criteria used for grouping Wisdom users.
RoutingProfileArn: Grouping the users by their Amazon Connect routing profile ARN. User should have SearchRoutingProfile and DescribeRoutingProfile permissions when setting criteria to this value.

nested_items.name: values
nested_items.description: The list of values that define different groups of Wisdom users.
When setting criteria to RoutingProfileArn, you need to provide a list of ARNs of Amazon Connect routing profiles as values of this parameter.

nested_items.description: The identifier of the knowledge base. This should not be a QUICK_RESPONSES type knowledge base if you're storing Wisdom Content resource to it. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: language
nested_items.description: The language code value for the language in which the quick response is written.

nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the user who last updated the quick response data.
